title: Adobe Garamond Premier Pro
content: I am looking to purchase the Adobe Garamond Premier Pro but for some reason you can only purchase this in the United States. Any advice in what to do? Thanks
author: Nicola_neo

comments.content:
i think this came up before and the answer was to try to purchase it from one of Adobe's resellers, ie [Veer](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419203138/http:/www.veer.com/products/typedetail.aspx?image=ADT0005368).

see [this posting](http://web.archive.org/node/28670#comment-162218) for more details.

I think you need to change the store to UK.

Tim

...forgot to mention that the Linotype store don't sell the Greek type, which is part of Garamond Premier Pro, and what i need as well as English.

Thank you.

The greek part is inside the OpenType fonts. If you buy Adobe's Garamond Premiere Pro from Linotype, the Greek character sets are inside those fonts, just as if you would license the fonts from anywhere else!
